mapper.select: SELECT T1.USER_NO , T1.USER_NAME , SUM ( CASE WHEN T2.H_CAUSE = '연차지급' THEN T2.H_GIVE ELSE 0 END ) AS GIVE_DAY , SUM ( CASE WHEN T2.H_CAUSE = '연차사용' THEN T2.H_GIVE ELSE 0 END ) AS USE_DAY , SUM ( CASE WHEN T2.H_CAUSE = '추가지급' THEN T2.H_GIVE ELSE 0 END ) AS ADD_DAY FROM MEMBER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN HOLIDAY T2 ON T1.USER_NO = T2.USER_NO GROUP BY T1.USER_NO , T1.USER_NAME ORDER BY T1.USER_NO ASC
SELECT HOLIDAY_NO , H.USER_NO , USER_NAME , H_TYPE , H_SORT , H_START , H_FINISH , H_DATE , H_REASON , H.STATUS FROM HOLIDAY_APPLY H join member on (member.user_no = h.user_no)

select user_no , user_name , phone , mail , to_char(hire_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "HIRE_DATE" , to_char(resign_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "resign_date" , employee_no , position_name as "POSITION" , department_name as "DEPARTMENT" , profile_img , status from member join dept on (member.department = dept.department_no) join position on (member.position = position.position_no) order by user_no

select m.user_name , m.user_no , COUNT( CASE WHEN w.STATUS ='결근' then 1 end ) AS "absenteeism" , COUNT( CASE WHEN w.STATUS ='조퇴' then 1 end ) AS "leavearly" , COUNT( CASE WHEN w.STATUS ='지각' then 1 end ) AS "behindtime" FROM member m join work w on (w.user_no = m.user_no) WHERE SUBSTR(WORK_DATE,0,8) BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YY'),'YY/MM/DD') ) AND (LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)) group by m.user_name, m.user_no order by user_no

select m.user_name , m.user_no , SUM(w.WORK_TIME) as "work_time" , count(w.work_time) as "work_count" FROM member m join work w on (w.user_no = m.user_no) WHERE SUBSTR(WORK_DATE,0,8) BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YY'),'YY/MM/DD') ) AND (LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)) group by m.user_name, m.user_no order by user_no ASC
